metadataAttributes.Title: Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion for Organizational Leaders Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Activating DEI Insights to Shape Your Organization. Critically examine power, privilege, bias, stereotypes, social identities, and justice to develop strategies for integrating diversity, equity, and inclusion into your organization.
metadataAttributes.Skills: DEI Strategy, Organization Development, Workplace Inclusion, Cross-Cultural Communication, Leadership And Management, Emotional Intelligence, Social Justice, Business Psychology, Critical Thinking, Business Strategy, Leadership Development, Business Communication,
